0xDF70B41B.name: SET_ENTITY_COORDS

params.name: entity
params.description: The entity to change coordinates for.

params.name: alive
params.description: Unused by the game, potentially used by debug builds of GTA in order to assert whether or not an entity was alive.

params.name: deadFlag
params.description: Whether to disable physics for dead peds, too, and not just living peds.

params.name: ragdollFlag
params.description: A special flag used for ragdolling peds.

params.name: clearArea
params.description: Whether to clear any entities in the target area.

0xDF70B41B.description:
Sets the coordinates (world position) for a specified entity, offset by the radius of the entity on the Z axis.

**This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native [SET_ENTITY_COORDS](?\_0x06843DA7060A026B).**
